name: get_brands
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cigars.
Tool description: Data about Cigar brands, Cigars, and country data
API description: Fetches cigar brands from the RapidAPI endpoint, allowing for pagination and optional search filtering.

page.description: The page number to retrieve for pagination.

search.description: A search term to filter cigar brands. Defaults to 'Dominican'.
